title: Earthworms
creator_credit: Pat Dowling and Pat Dowling Pictures
brief_description: Shows the life cycle of the earthworm and gives detailed information on its habits. Explains its value in digesting plant food to enrich the soil. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
description: Shows the life cycle of the earthworm and gives detailed information on its habits. Explains its value in digesting plant food to enrich the soil. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
